Title: .Net Untappd API Client
Description: .Net Untappd API Client is a wrapper around the Untappd v3 API. It's developed in C# and works on .Net 3.5, Silverlight 3/4, and Windows Phone.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
.Net Untappd API Client is a wrapper around the Untappd v3 API. It's developed in C# and works on .Net 3.5, Silverlight 3/4, and Windows Phone.


The following methods are implemented along with unit tests:
  • Friend Feed
  • User Feed
  • Beer Info
  • Beer Search
  • Checkin
  • Checkin (Test)
